Modular 3D Game Environments

This module will prepare you for the creation of an environment art project using modularity. You will employ workflows of modularity, the grid, trimsheets, shader creation, and lighting to form a piece of environment art based on a real world and concept art references.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Demonstrate advanced knowledge of 3D environment creation in relation to design principles and based upon informed decision making.

+  Investigate and apply appropriate real-time 3D game environment creation techniques in the production of Environment Art.

+  Identify key visual features in the reference and investigate solutions for recreating them in unreal engine.

+  Communicate and critically review the development of the game environment evaluating the effectiveness of your chosen techniques in the pipeline.
